channel.title: Some packets
channel.description:
Can someone add these to the wiki? 317.
opcode 121, length 4 next song id - u short LE A prev song id - u short A queues a song to be played next opcode 122, length 4 interface id - short LE A text colour - short LE A sets the text colour for an interface opcode 87, length 6 setting id - short LE default value - int ME S sets the default value of a button, then proceeds to set that button's value to the new default value opcode 36, length 3 setting id - short LE default value - byte sets the default value of a button, then proceeds to set that button's value to the new default value * same as opcode 87, except allows for efficiency via smaller default value opcode 106, len 1 - show tab tab id u byte c - opcode 53. len var short - update item container interface id u short amt of items u short for amt of items amount = u byte if (amount == 255) amount = int ME B id = u short le a - opcode 104, len var short? - adds an option to the player right click list option position u byte c flag u byte a (someone should test what this flag does, set it to 0 and 1 and observe the difference) action string
I don't have the time at the moment. ps contribute to my git pls :-)

item.title: Some packets
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:

[quote=“tL, post:13, topic:544241”][quote]I don’t have the time at the moment.

ps contribute to my git pls

[/quote]

what a dickhead[/quote]

[quote=“sinisoul, post:7, topic:544241”]these packets are ALL fairly well known, packet discovery isnt a thing anymore. youre like 10 years late.[/quote]they aren’t on the wiki

Read full topic

item.title: Some packets
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:544241”][quote]opcode 122, length 4

interface id - short LE A
text colour - short LE A

sets the text colour for an interface[/quote]
This one is the one I never knew about.
Edit: they’re already on the wiki[/quote]Uh, I’ve updated the description for packets 36/87.

[hr]

Edit:

106, len 1 - show tab

tab id u byte c

  1. len var short - update item container

interface id u short
amt of items u short

for amt of items
amount = u byte

if (amount == 255)  amount = int ME B
id = u short le a

104, len var short? - adds an option to the player right click list

option position u byte c
flag u byte a (someone should test what this flag does, set it to 0 and 1 and observe the difference)
action string

Read full topic

item.title: Some packets
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Can someone add these to the wiki? 317.

opcode 121, length 4

next song id - u short LE A
prev song id - u short A

queues a song to be played next

opcode 122, length 4

interface id - short LE A
text colour - short LE A

sets the text colour for an interface

opcode 87, length 6

setting id - short LE
default value - int ME S

sets the default value of a button, then proceeds to set that button’s value to the
new default value

opcode 36, length 3

setting id - short LE
default value - byte

sets the default value of a button, then proceeds to set that button’s value to the
new default value

  • same as opcode 87, except allows for efficiency via smaller default value

opcode 106, len 1 - show tab

tab id u byte c

opcode 53. len var short - update item container

interface id u short
amt of items u short

for amt of items
amount = u byte

if (amount == 255) amount = int ME B
id = u short le a

opcode 104, len var short? - adds an option to the player right click list

option position u byte c
flag u byte a (someone should test what this flag does, set it to 0 and 1 and observe the difference)
action string

I don’t have the time at the moment.

ps contribute to my git pls

Read full topic
